description: This salad bowl packs in the greens with a luscious and creamy avocado dressing.
keywords: Chicken salad,Soy free,Wheat free,Egg free,Lemon,Chicken,Avocado,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Green Goddess Salad Bowl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 5 large spring onions, sliced, green tips reserved

recipeInstructions.text: Put the avocados, half the basil and coriander, hemp seeds, nutritional yeast, lemon zest and juice in a blender and blitz until smooth. Add water as needed to loosen.
Brush the chicken breasts with oil and cook in a griddle pan on a high heat for 3-4 minutes on each side or until cooked through. Remove from the pan and thinly slice.
Add the dressing to the base of a large mixing bowl and add the cabbage, spring onions, cucumber, quinoa and lemon zest to the bowl. Toss well to coat with the dressing.
Divide the salad between 4 bowls, top each with sliced chicken and serve with the remaining chopped basil and coriander scattered on top.
